title: Three.js Sandbox - Miami
description: Interactive Three.js playground with a torus knot, orbit controls, and particle backdrop.

title: Script Editor
description: Create and refine vector stroke data for script characters with live playback and editing tools.

title: Script Font Morph
description: Animate high-density point clouds that morph between script glyphs with interactive controls.

title: Text Effects Studio
description: Design stylized neon, chrome, and bloom-heavy text renders with realtime Three.js post-processing.

title: Text Writer
description: Animate stroke-by-stroke text drawing with adjustable size, stroke width, and colors.

title: Verbs Galaxy - Roots Edition
description: Explore 350+ verb roots in a 3D galaxy with search, audio pronunciations, and conjugation panels.
